attributes.action: The immediate resignation of Robin Swan the Northern Ireland Health Minister
attributes.additional_details: Robin Swann, since the beginning of the covid-19 pandemic has done nothing but make mistake after mistake. Open borders and the closure of gp face to face appointments which is the current reason behind the near collapse of our NHS.
attributes.background: We want the government to force the resignation of robin swann, the health minister for Northern Ireland

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.  In any case, the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the appointment of Ministers in Northern Ireland.
